GSD37gautdh_u:3: GautSt_1.3: dṛṣṭo dharmavyatikramaḥ sāhasaṃ ca mahatāṃ |
GSD37gautdh_u:38: GautSt_1.35: prāṅmukha udaṅmukho vā śaucam ārabheta |
GSD37gautdh_u:39: GautSt_1.36: śucau deśe āsīno dakṣiṇaṃ bāhuṃ jānvantarākṛtvā yajñopavītyā maṇibandhanāt pāṇī prakṣālya vāgyatohṛdayaspṛśas triś catur vāpa ācāmed |
GSD37gautdh_u:45: GautSt_1.37: suptvā bhuktvā kṣutvā ca punaḥ |
GSD37gautdh_u:49: GautSt_1.40: cyuteśu āsrāvavad vidyān nigirann eva tac
GSD37gautdh_u:51: GautSt_1.41: na mukhyā vipruṣa ucchiṣṭaṃ kurvanti na ced aṅgenipatanti |
GSD37gautdh_u:53: GautSt_1.43: tad adbhiḥ pūrvaṃ mṛdā ca |
GSD37gautdh_u:57: GautSt_1.46: pāṇinā savyam upasaṅgṛhya anaṅguṣṭham adhīhi bho ity āmantrayed guruṃ |
GSD37gautdh_u:65: GautSt_1.51: oṃ pūrvā vyāhṛtayaḥ pañca satyāntāḥ |
GSD37gautdh_u:68: GautSt_1.54: anujñāta upaviśet prāṅmukho dakṣiṇataḥ śiṣya udaṅmukhovā |
GSD37gautdh_u:80: GautSt_2.1a: prāg upanayanāt kāmacāraḥ kāmavādaḥ kāmabhakṣaḥ |
GSD37gautdh_u:89: GautSt_2.4: na tv evainam agnihavanabaliharaṇayor niyuñjyāt |
GSD37gautdh_u:98: GautSt_2.11: tiṣṭhet pūrvām āsītottarāṃ sajyotiṣyā jyotiṣodarśanād vāgyataḥ |
GSD37gautdh_u:143: GautSt_2.45: dvādaśa varṣāṇy ekavede brahmacaryaṃ caret |
GSD37gautdh_u:154: GautSt_3.3: teṣāṃ gṛhastho yonir aprajanatvād itereṣām |
GSD37gautdh_u:160: GautSt_3.8: tadabhāve vṛddhe sabrahmacāriṇy agnau vā |
GSD37gautdh_u:177: GautSt_3.21: na dvitīyām apartu rātriṃ grāme vaset |
GSD37gautdh_u:206: GautSt_4.7: saṃyogamantraḥ prājāpatye saha dharmaś caryatām iti |
GSD37gautdh_u:221: GautSt_4.18: brāhmaṇy ajījanat putrān varṇebhya ānupūrvyādbrāhmaṇasūtamāgadhacaṇḍālān |
GSD37gautdh_u:240: GautSt_4.33: daśa pūrvān daśa parān ātmānaṃ cabrāhmīputro
GSD37gautdh_u:254: GautSt_5.10: agnāv agnir dhanvantarir viśve devāḥ prajāpatiḥsviṣṭakṛd iti homaḥ |
GSD37gautdh_u:280: GautSt_5.32: śrotriyasya tu pādyam arghyam annaviśeṣāṃś caprakārayet |
GSD37gautdh_u:320: GautSt_6.14: bho bhavann iti vayasyaḥ samāne 'hani jātaḥ |
GSD37gautdh_u:364: GautSt_8.1: dvau loke dhṛtavratau rājā brāhmaṇaś ca
GSD37gautdh_u:389: GautSt_8.19: agnyādheyam agnihotraṃ darśapūrṇamāsāvāgrayaṇaṃ cāturmāsyāni nirūḍhapaśubandhaḥ sautrāmaṇīti saptahaviryajñasamsthāḥ |
GSD37gautdh_u:391: GautSt_8.20: agniṣṭomo 'tyagniṣṭoma ukthyaḥ ṣoḍaśīvājapeyo 'tirātro 'ptoryāma iti sapta somasaṃsthāḥ |
GSD37gautdh_u:394: GautSt_8.23: dayā sarvabhūteṣu kṣāntir anasūyā śaucam anāyāsomaṅgalam akārpaṇyam aspṛheti
GSD37gautdh_u:395: GautSt_8.24: yasyaite catvāriṃśatsaṃskārā na cāṣṭāv ātmaguṇāna sa brahmaṇaḥ sāyujyaṃ sālokyaṃ gacchati |
GSD37gautdh_u:396: GautSt_8.25: yasya tu khalu saṃskārāṇām ekadeśo 'py aṣṭāv ātmaguṇā atha sa brahmaṇaḥ sāyujyaṃ sālokyaṃ cagacchati |
GSD37gautdh_u:399: GautSt_9.1: sa vidhipūrvakaṃ snātvā bhāryām adhigamyayathoktān gṛhasthadharmān prayuñjāna imāni vratāny anukarṣet |
GSD37gautdh_u:404: GautSt_9.3: sati vibhave na jīrṇamalavadvāsāḥ syāt |
GSD37gautdh_u:405: GautSt_9.4: na raktam ulbaṇam anyadhṛtaṃ vāso bibhṛyāt |
GSD37gautdh_u:409: GautSt_9.8: nāgnim apaś ca yugapad dhārayet |
GSD37gautdh_u:413: GautSt_9.12: na vāyvagniviprādityāpo devatā gāś ca pratipaśyan vā mūtrapurīṣāmedhyān vyudasyet
GSD37gautdh_u:415: GautSt_9.13: naitā devatāḥ prati pādau prasārayet |
GSD37gautdh_u:429: GautSt_9.25: na mithunī bhūtvā śaucaṃ prati vilambeta |
GSD37gautdh_u:430: GautSt_9.26: na ca tasmin śayane svādhyāyam adhīyīta |
GSD37gautdh_u:431: GautSt_9.27: na cāpararātram adhītya punaḥ pratisaṃviśet |
GSD37gautdh_u:448: GautSt_9.41: ubhe mūtrapurīṣe tu divā kuryād udaṅmukhaḥ |
GSD37gautdh_u:453: GautSt_9.44: pālāśam āsanaṃ pāduke dantadhāvanam iti ca
GSD37gautdh_u:473: GautSt_9.59: sāyaṃprātas tv annam abhipūjitam anindan bhuñjīta |
GSD37gautdh_u:474: GautSt_9.60: na kadācid rātrau nagnaḥ svapet |
GSD37gautdh_u:483: GautSt_9.67: manasā vā tatsamagram ācāram anupālayed āpatkalpaḥ |
GSD37gautdh_u:490: GautSt_9.73: nityam ahiṃsro mṛdur dṛḍhakārī damadānaśīlaḥ |
GSD37gautdh_u:491: GautSt_9.74: evam ācāro mātāpitarau pūrvāparāṃś ca sambandhānduritebhyo mokṣayiṣyan snātakaḥ śaśvadbrahmalokān na cyavate na cyavate |
GSD37gautdh_u:515: GautSt_10.19: kṣatriyaś ced anyas tam upajīvet tadvṛttyā |
GSD37gautdh_u:520: GautSt_10.23: anyat tu yathārhaṃ bhājayed rājā |
GSD37gautdh_u:521: GautSt_10.24: rājño balidānaṃ karṣakairdaśamam aṣṭamaṃ ṣaṣṭhaṃ vā |
GSD37gautdh_u:530: GautSt_10.31: śilpino māsi māsy ekaikaṃ karma kuryuḥ |
GSD37gautdh_u:537: GautSt_10.36: pranaṣṭam asvāmikam adhigamya rājñe prabrūyuḥ |
GSD37gautdh_u:539: GautSt_10.38: ūrdhvam adhigantuś caturthaṃ rājñaḥ śeṣaḥ |
GSD37gautdh_u:547: GautSt_10.45: abrāhmaṇo 'py ākhyātā ṣaṣṭhaṃ labhetety eke
GSD37gautdh_u:569: GautSt_10.61: yaṃ cāryam āśrayed bhartavyas tena kṣīṇo 'pi
GSD37gautdh_u:588: GautSt_11.7: tam uparyāsīnam adhastād upāsīrann anyebrāhmaṇebhyaḥ |
GSD37gautdh_u:598: GautSt_11.14: brahmaprasūtaṃ hi kṣattram ṛdhyate na vyathata iti cavijñāyate |
GSD37gautdh_u:600: GautSt_11.15: yāni ca daivotpātacintakāḥ prabrūyus tānyādriyeta |
GSD37gautdh_u:601: GautSt_11.16: tadadhīnam api hy eke yogakṣemaṃ pratijānate
GSD37gautdh_u:605: GautSt_11.19: tasya ca vyavahāro vedo dharmaśāstrāṇy aṅgānyupavedāḥ purāṇam |
GSD37gautdh_u:616: GautSt_11.26: tathā hy asya niḥśreyasaṃ bhavati |
GSD37gautdh_u:620: GautSt_11.28: daṇḍo damanād ity āhus tenādāntān damayet |
GSD37gautdh_u:627: GautSt_11.31: tān ācāryopadeśo daṇḍaś ca pālayate |
GSD37gautdh_u:636: GautSt_12.4: atha hāsya vedam upaśṛṇvatas trapujatubhyāṃśrotrapratipūraṇam |
GSD37gautdh_u:664: GautSt_12.28: go'gnyarthe tṛṇamedhān vīrudvanaspatīnāṃ capuṣpāṇi svavad ādadīta phalāni cāparivṛtānām |
GSD37gautdh_u:665: GautSt_12.29: kusīdavṛddhir dharmyā viṃśatiḥ pañcamāṣikī māsam |
GSD37gautdh_u:684: GautSt_12.43: stenaḥ prakīrṇakeṣo musalī rājānam iyātkarmācakṣānaḥ |
GSD37gautdh_u:697: GautSt_13.2: bahavaḥ syur aninditāḥ svakarmasu prātyayikā rājñāṃniṣprītyanabhitāpāś cānyatarasmin
GSD37gautdh_u:724: GautSt_13.23: mithyāvacane yāpyo daṇḍyaś ca sākṣī |
GSD37gautdh_u:725: GautSt_13.24: nānṛtavacane doṣo jīvanaṃ cet tadadhīnam |
GSD37gautdh_u:727: GautSt_13.26: rājā prāḍvivāko brāhmaṇo vā śāstravit |
GSD37gautdh_u:741: GautSt_14.6: tac ced antaḥ punar āpatec cheṣeṇa śudhyeran |
GSD37gautdh_u:765: GautSt_14.29: avaraś ced varṇaḥ pūrvavarṇam upaspṛśet pūrvovāvaraṃ tatra śavoktam āśaucam
GSD37gautdh_u:778: GautSt_14.39: na māṃsaṃ bhakṣayeyur ā pradānāt |
GSD37gautdh_u:804: GautSt_15.12: na ca tena mitrakarma kuryāt |
GSD37gautdh_u:805: GautSt_15.13: putrābhāve sapiṇḍā mātṛsapiṇḍāḥ śiṣyāś ca dadyuḥ |
GSD37gautdh_u:822: GautSt_15.22: sadyaḥ śrāddhī śūdrātalpagas tatpurīṣe māsaṃnayati pitṛṛn |
GSD37gautdh_u:823: GautSt_15.23: tasmāt tadaham brahmacārī ca syāt |
GSD37gautdh_u:831: triṇāciketastrimadhus trisuparṇaḥ pañcāgniḥ snātako mantrabrāhmaṇavid dharmajñobrahmadeyānusaṃtāna iti |
GSD37gautdh_u:840: GautSt_16.2: ardhapañcamān māsān pañca dakṣiṇāyanaṃ vā |
GSD37gautdh_u:841: GautSt_16.3: brahmacāry utsṛṣṭalomā na māṃsaṃ bhuñjīta |
GSD37gautdh_u:895: GautSt_17.1: praśastānāṃ svakarmasu dvijātīnāṃ brāhmaṇo bhuñjīta |
GSD37gautdh_u:921: GautSt_17.22: goś ca kṣīram anirdaśāyāḥ sūtake |
GSD37gautdh_u:923: GautSt_17.24: nityam āvikam apeyam auṣṭram aikaśaphaṃ ca |
GSD37gautdh_u:967: GautSt_18.20: trīn kumāry ṛtūn atītya svayaṃyujyetāninditenotsṛjya pitryān alaṃkārān |
GSD37gautdh_u:971: GautSt_18.23: prāg vāsasaḥ pratipatter ity eke |
GSD37gautdh_u:980: GautSt_18.31: tena hi bhartavyaḥ śrutaśīlasaṃpannaś cet |
GSD37gautdh_u:986: GautSt_19.2: atha khalv ayaṃ puruṣo yāpyena karmaṇā lipyate yathaitad ayājyayājanam abhakṣyabhakṣaṇam avadyavadanaṃśiṣṭasyākriyā pratiṣiddhasevanam iti |
GSD37gautdh_u:987: GautSt_19.3: tatra prāyaścittaṃ kuryāt na kuryād iti
GSD37gautdh_u:990: GautSt_19.5: na hi karma kṣīyata iti |
GSD37gautdh_u:992: GautSt_19.7: punaḥstomeneṣṭvā punaḥ savanam āyāntīti vijñāyate |
GSD37gautdh_u:998: GautSt_19.11: tasya niṣkrayaṇāni japas tapo homa upavāso
GSD37gautdh_u:1000: GautSt_19.12: upaniṣado vedāntaḥ sarvacchandaḥsu saṃhitā madhūnyaghamarṣaṇam atharvaśiro rudrāḥ puruṣasūktaṃ rājatarauhine
GSD37gautdh_u:1001: sāmanībṛhadrathantare puruṣagatir mahānāmnyo mahāvairājaṃ mahādivākīrtyaṃjyeṣṭhasāmnām anyatamad bahiṣpavamānaṃ kūṣmāṇḍāni pāvamānyaḥsāvitrī ceti pāvamānāni |
GSD37gautdh_u:1003: GautSt_19.13: payovratatā śākabhakṣatā phalabhakṣatāprasṛtayāvako hiraṇyaprāśanaṃ ghṛtaprāśanaṃ somapānam itimedhyāni |
GSD37gautdh_u:1005: GautSt_19.14: sarve śiloccayāḥ sarvāḥ sravantyaḥ puṇyā hradāstīrthāny ṛṣinivāsā goṣṭhapariskandhā iti deśāḥ |
GSD37gautdh_u:1008: GautSt_19.16: hiraṇyaṃ gaur vāso 'śvo bhūmis tilā ghṛtam
GSD37gautdh_u:1011: GautSt_19.17: saṃvatsaraḥ ṣaṇmāsāś catvāras trayo vā dvauvaikaś caturviṃśatyaho dvādaśāhaḥ ṣaḍahas tryaho 'horātra itikālāḥ |
GSD37gautdh_u:1014: GautSt_19.19: enaḥsu(enas) guruṣu gurūṇi laghuṣu laghūni |
GSD37gautdh_u:1019: GautSt_20.1: tyajet pitaraṃ(pitṛ) rājaghātakaṃ śūdrayājakaṃśūdrārthayājakaṃ vedaviplāvakaṃ bhrūṇahanaṃ yaś cāntyāvasāyibhiḥsaha saṃvased antyāvasāyinyāṃ ca |
GSD37gautdh_u:1021: GautSt_20.2: tasya vidyāgurūn yonisaṃbandhāṃś ca saṃnipātyasarvāṇy udakādīni pretakāryāṇi kuryuḥ |
GSD37gautdh_u:1024: GautSt_20.4: dāsaḥ karmakaro vāvakarād amedhyapātram ānīyadāsīghaṭāt pūrayitvā dakṣiṇāmukho yadā viparyasyed amukam anudakaṃkaromi iti nāmagrāham |
GSD37gautdh_u:1029: GautSt_20.8: ata uttaraṃ tena saṃbhāṣya tiṣṭhed ekarātraṃ
GSD37gautdh_u:1034: GautSt_20.10: yas tu prāyaścittena śudhyet tasmiñ śuddheśātakumbhamayaṃ pātraṃ puṇyatamād dhradāt pūrayitvā sravantībhyovā
GSD37gautdh_u:1036: GautSt_20.11: athāsmai tatpātram dadyus tatapratigṛhya japecśāntā dyauḥ śāntā pṛthivī śāntaṃ śivam antarikṣaṃ yo rocanastābhamam gṛhṇāmiiti |
GSD37gautdh_u:1043: GautSt_20.15: yasya tu prāṇāntikaṃ prāyaścittaṃ sa mṛtaḥśudhyet |
GSD37gautdh_u:1045: GautSt_20.16: sarvāṇy eva tasminn udakādīni pretakarmāṇi kuryuḥ |
GSD37gautdh_u:1060: GautSt_21.8: na strīṣv agurutalpaṃ patatīty eke |
GSD37gautdh_u:1068: GautSt_21.12: ajñānād andhyāpanād ṛtvigācāryaupatanīyasevāyāṃ ca heyau |
GSD37gautdh_u:1076: GautSt_21.19: durbalahiṃsāyāṃ ca vimocane śaktaś cet |
GSD37gautdh_u:1086: GautSt_22.2: agnau saktir brahmaghnas trir avacchātasya |
GSD37gautdh_u:1087: GautSt_22.3: lakṣyaṃ vā syāt janye śastrabhṛtām |
GSD37gautdh_u:1104: GautSt_22.15: vaiśye tu traivārṣikam ṛṣabhaikaśatāś ca gādadyād |
GSD37gautdh_u:1106: GautSt_22.16: śūdre saṃvatsaram ṛṣabhaikādaśāś ca gā dadyāt |
GSD37gautdh_u:1113: GautSt_22.22: api vāsthanvatām ekaikasmin kiṃcid dadyāt |
GSD37gautdh_u:1128: GautSt_22.35: strī yāticāriṇī guptā piṇḍaṃ tu labheta |
GSD37gautdh_u:1130: GautSt_22.36: amānuṣīṣu govarjaṃ strīkṛte kūṣmāṇḍair ghṛtahomoghṛtahomaḥ |
GSD37gautdh_u:1132: GautSt_23.1: surāpasya brāhmaṇasyoṣṇām āsiñceyuḥ surām āsyemṛtaḥ śudhyet |
GSD37gautdh_u:1133: GautSt_23.2: amatyā pāne payo ghṛtam udakaṃ vāyuṃ
GSD37gautdh_u:1138: GautSt_23.6: gandhāghrāṇe surāpasya prāṇāyāmā ghṛtaprāśanaṃ ca |
GSD37gautdh_u:1143: GautSt_23.10: liṅgaṃ vā savṛṣaṇam utkṛtya añjalāv ādhāyadakṣiṇāpratīcīṃ vrajed ajihmam ā śarīranipātāt |
GSD37gautdh_u:1149: GautSt_23.14: śvabhir ādayed rājā nihīnavarṇagamane striyaṃprakāśam |
GSD37gautdh_u:1166: GautSt_23.22: aśuciṃ dṛṣṭvā ādityam īkṣeta prāṇāyāmaṃ kṛtvā |
GSD37gautdh_u:1180: GautSt_23.31: sapta puruṣānitaś ca parataś ca hanti
GSD37gautdh_u:1181: manasāpiguror(guru) anṛtaṃ vadann alpeṣv apy artheṣu |
GSD37gautdh_u:1190: GautSt_24.2: caturṛcaṃ taratsamandīty apsu japed apratigrāhyaṃpratijighṛkṣan pratigṛhya vā
GSD37gautdh_u:1195: GautSt_24.6: payovrato vā daśarātraṃ ghṛtena dvitīyam adbhistṛtīyaṃ divādiṣv ekabhaktiko jalaklinnavāsā lomāni nakhāni
GSD37gautdh_u:1196: tvacammāṃsaṃ śoṇitaṃ snāyvasthi majjānam iti homā ātmano mukhe mṛtyor āsyejuhomīty antataḥ sarveṣāṃ prāyaścittaṃ bhrūṇahatyāyāḥ |
GSD37gautdh_u:1205: GautSt_24.11: sāvitrīṃ vā sahasrakṛtva āvartayan punītehaivātmānam |
GSD37gautdh_u:1214: GautSt_25.3: so 'māvāsyāyāṃ niśy agnim upasamādhāyaprāyaścittājyāhutīr juhoti |
GSD37gautdh_u:1218: anuparyukṣya yajñavāstu kṛtvopotthāyasamāsiñcatu ity etayā trir upatiṣṭheta |
GSD37gautdh_u:1220: GautSt_25.5: traya ime lokā eṣāṃ lokānām abhijityā
GSD37gautdh_u:1223: GautSt_25.6: etad evaikeṣām karmādhikṛtya yo 'prayata iva syāt saitthaṃ juhuyād ittham anumantrayeta varo dakṣiṇeti prāyaścittamaviśeṣāt |
GSD37gautdh_u:1225_1: ayonau(yoni) ca doṣavati ca karmaṇy apisaṃdhipūrve 'bliṅgābhir apa upaspṛśed vāruṇībhir
GSD37gautdh_u:1228: GautSt_25.9: sarvāsv apo vācāmed ahaś ca mādityāś ca punātuiti prātā rātriś ca mā varuṇaś ca punātv iti sāyam |
GSD37gautdh_u:1229: GautSt_25.10: aṣṭo vā samidha ādadhyād devakṛtasyeti hutvāeva sarvasmād enaso mucyate |
GSD37gautdh_u:1235: GautSt_26.2: haviṣyān prātar āśān bhuktvā tisro rātrīrnāśnīyāt |
GSD37gautdh_u:1236: GautSt_26.3: athāparaṃ try ahaṃ naktaṃ bhuñjīta |
GSD37gautdh_u:1237: GautSt_26.4: athāparaṃ try ahaṃ na kaṃcana yāceta |
GSD37gautdh_u:1239: GautSt_26.6: tiṣṭhed(sthā) ahani rātrāv āsīta kṣiprakāmaḥ |
GSD37gautdh_u:1244: GautSt_26.10: anusavanam udakopasparśanam āpo hi ṣṭhetitisṛbhiḥ pavitravatībhir mārjayīta(mṛj)
GSD37gautdh_u:1251: namaḥ pārāya supārāya mahāpārāya vārayiṣṇave namaḥ |
GSD37gautdh_u:1253: tryambakāyaikacarāyādhipatayeharāya(hari) śarvāyeśānāyogrāya vajriṇe ghṛṇine kapardine namaḥ |
GSD37gautdh_u:1258: namaḥ satyāya pāvakāya pāvakavarṇāyakāmāya kāmarūpiṇe namaḥ |
GSD37gautdh_u:1261: namaḥ sobhyāya supuruṣāyamahāpuruṣāya madhyamapuruṣāyottamapuruṣāya brahmacāriṇe namaḥ |
GSD37gautdh_u:1270: GautSt_26.16: agnaye(agni) svāhā somāya svāhāgniṣomābhyāmindrāgnibhyām indrāya viśvebhyo devebhyo brahmaṇe prajāpataye 'gnayesviṣṭakṛta iti |
GSD37gautdh_u:1273: GautSt_26.19: yāvat sakṛd ādadīta(ādā) tāvad aśnīyāt |
GSD37gautdh_u:1275: GautSt_26.21: prathamaṃ caritvā śuciḥ pūtaḥ karmaṇyo bhavati |
GSD37gautdh_u:1276: GautSt_26.22: dvitīyaṃ caritvā yatkiṃcid anyan mahāpātakebhyaḥpāpaṃ kurute tasmāt pramucyate
GSD37gautdh_u:1277: GautSt_26.23: tṛtīyaṃ caritvā sarvasmād enaso mucyate |
GSD37gautdh_u:1279: GautSt_26.24: athaitāṃs trīn kṛcchrāṃś caritvā sarveṣu vedeṣusnāto bhavati sarvair devair jñāto bhavati |
GSD37gautdh_u:1289: 1,91.18) navonava (RV 10,85.19) iti caitābhis tarpaṇam ājyahomo haviṣaś cānumantraṇamupasthānaṃ candramasaḥ |
GSD37gautdh_u:1290: GautSt_27.6: yad devā devaheḍanam iti catasṛbhirjuhuyāt |
GSD37gautdh_u:1293: GautSt_27.8: oṃ bhūr bhuvaḥ svas tapaḥ satyaṃ yaśaḥ śrīr ūrgiḍaujas tejo varcaḥ puruṣo dharmaḥ śiva ity etair grāsānumantraṇaṃpratimantraṃ manasā |
GSD37gautdh_u:1305: GautSt_27.16: evam āptvā vipāpo vipāpmā sarvam eno(enas)hanti |
GSD37gautdh_u:1307: GautSt_27.17: dvitīyam āptvā daśa pūrvān daśa parān
GSD37gautdh_u:1310: GautSt_27.18: saṃvatsaraṃ cāptvā candramasaḥ salokatām āpnotisalokatām āpnoti |
GSD37gautdh_u:1313: GautSt_28.1: ūrdhavaṃ pituḥ(pitṛ) putrā rikthaṃ bhajeran |
GSD37gautdh_u:1316: GautSt_28.3: sarvaṃ vā pūrvajasyetarān bibhṛyāt pitṛvat |
GSD37gautdh_u:1322: GautSt_28.7: avir dhānyāyasī gṛhamano yuktaṃ catuṣpādaṃcaikaikaṃ yavīyasaḥ |
GSD37gautdh_u:1328: GautSt_28.11: ekaikaṃ vā dhanarūpaṃ kāmyaṃ pūrvaḥ pūrvolabhate |
GSD37gautdh_u:1356: GautSt_28.30: svayam arjitam avaidyebhyo vaidyaḥ kāmaṃ na
GSD37gautdh_u:1379: GautSt_28.48: anājñāte daśāvaraiḥ śiṣṭair ūhavidbhir alubdhaiḥ praśastaṃ kāryam |
GSD37gautdh_u:1381: GautSt_28.49: catvāraś caturṇāṃ pāragā vedānāṃ prāg uttamāttraya āśramiṇaḥ pṛthag dharmavidas traya etān daśāvarān pariṣad ity
GSD37gautdh_u:1384: GautSt_28.50: asambhave tv eteṣāṃ śrotriyo vedavicchiṣṭovipratipattau yad āha |
GSD37gautdh_u:1386: GautSt_28.52: dharmiṇāṃ viśeṣeṇa svargaṃ lokaṃ dharmavid āpnotijñānābhiniveśābhyām |
